summary: A relationship gradually develops between a savvy New York street girl and a good-hearted cab driver, but other matters keep getting in their way, including financial problems and a murder.
cast: Carole Lombard|Pat O'Brien|Mayo Methot|Jack La Rue|Shirley Grey|Ward Bond|Willard Robertson|Lew Kelly|Fred Santley|Arthur Wanzer|Jessie Arnold|Edwin Stanley|Vance Carroll|Jack Cheatham|Sherry Hall|Edward LeSaint|Charles McMurphy|Lew Meehan|King Mojave|Field Norton|Paddy O'Flynn|Buddy Roosevelt|Harry Semels
title: Virtue
